meanings.definition: The first part of the small intestine, connecting to the stomach.
meanings.sent1: After the stomach, food enters the duodenum.
meanings.sent2: The duodenum plays a crucial role in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The duodenum and the stomach had a chat about food processing.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was like a duodenum, always absorbing new information.
meanings.sent5: The duodenum, like a diligent worker, processes nutrients efficiently.
